titles: A discourse of auxiliary beauty. Or artificiall hansomenesse. In point of conscience between two ladies.
author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667,
Walker, Obadiah, 1616-1699,
publisher: Printed for R: Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-Lane,
notes: Also sometimes attributed to Jeremy Taylor and to Obadiah Walker.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Cosmetics --  Moral and ethical aspects --  Early works to 1800.
